Posts.Content: Hi rmjd, When I applied for blue badge I explained the the side effects of my medication caused severe muscle ache which is quite true, that is why I have limited mobility.  Loretta
Posts.Title: Blue Badge

Posts.Content: I applied for a blue badge and it was the best thing I have ever done it is such a big help to be able to park nearer to shops and not have to push a trolley across the car park and back to the shop to get a pound coin back Loretta
Posts.Title: Blue Badge

Posts.Content: I was diagnosed with breast cancer last April because I have type one diabetes, a heart condition,and had two mini strokes and have a stent in my artery I was told it would be to risky to have surgery and I would be treated with Tamoxifen. Unfortunately Hormone therapy has caused my blood sugar to rise I have a diabetic review in two weeks time and I know I will be in trouble again I have kept my condition under control for over twenty years but I really do not know what to do now is there anyone else out there with these sort of problems
Posts.Title: Diabetes and Cancer treatment
